Functions | Variables
IOS Fullduplex Common Utilities
Interface Examples

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides shared functionality for IOS full-duplex examples, including packet size configurations, system initialization, and common utilities used by both controller and device components.

Key Features

  1. Packet Configuration: Defines various packet sizes for testing, including configurations beyond maximum FIFO size
  2. System Setup: Implements cache and power settings for optimal full-duplex operation
  3. Debug Support: Provides ITM printf capability for monitoring and verification

Functions

  • Packet size configuration for testing
  • Board and cache system initialization
  • Power management setup
  • Debug interface configuration

Functions

void common_setup (void)
 

Variables
